system.description:
A trident enchanted with the power to empathically control fish.

  • Commanding fish: Speaking a command word causes all fish within 60’ to save versus spells or be charmed. This consumes one charge.

  • Failed save: The fish obeys empathic commands from the wielder, who can control its movement and behavioural state (e.g. anger, fear, hunger, etc.). The charm lasts as long as the fish can see the trident and the one who wields it.

  • Successful save: The fish is not charmed, but will not approach closer than 10’ to the wielder of the trident.

  • Schools of fish: May be treated as a single entity, rather than making a save for each individual fish.

  • Charges: [[/r 1d4+16]].
